ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Scale of the extent to which the participant is sad as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
Scale of the extent to which the participant is energetic as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
Scale of the extent to which the participant is angry as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
Scale of the extent to which the participant is hopeful as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
Scale of the extent to which the participant is nervous as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
Scale of the extent to which the participant is happy as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
Scale of the extent to which the participant rates their overall sleep quality in the past 24 hours as a part of the A2CPS Mood and Sleep Items (MSI)
